name: Pet Care, Shampoo Bar, Flea and Tick, All Natural
shortDescription: Our Natural flea and tick shampoo bar is great for pets, but also for children with lice! Rosemary, Lemongrass & local Oregon peppermint essential oils are effective insect repellents that work great when applied regularly. What a wonderful alternative to chemical repellents!
description:
Our all Natural Flea & Tick Shampoo Bar is made with the following great ingredients!

Rosemary, lemongrass, & local oregon peppermint essential oils are known insect repellents that work great when applied regularly.

What a wonderful alternative to chemical repellents!

Neem Oil - is a natural insecticide

Coconut & Castor Oil - offer a rich lather, but allows your pet's skin to retain all the natural oils it requires, leaving them feeling clean and really soft!

About Granny Smith

What happens when you take a suburban couple and transplant them onto acreage in a small Oregon town? For Brian and Janet Smith, it was the start of a simpler and healthier way of life. They gleaned so much knowledge from their friends and neighbors that it was only a matter of time before Granny Smith Natural Products was born.

Together with their five daughters, the Smiths learned important tasks such as raising hens, selling eggs, gardening, preserving foods, cheese-making, tending bees, and more. They took their knowledge and products to local fairs and stores and the rest is history.

Granny Smith products are made with only nourishing and soothing ingredients such as shea butter, coconut oil, beeswax, and vitamin E oil. They guarantee that you will be satisfied with their natural soaps and skin care products.
